title: Healthcare Competency Enhancement: Short-Term Disaster Preparedness Leadership Capacity Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster scenario recognition and corporate crisis management experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Explain and apply three or more core response procedures for different disaster types according to situational contexts
Can design and operate an organizational communication system during a disaster
Can create documents reflecting legal/safety standards when establishing an on-site evacuation plan

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
